name: Don't Save the Princess (itch)
description: The Flash version of the "critically acclaimed" indie game created by Shen Games, ported by Marsh, sponsored by NinjaKiwi! The princess has been kidnapped and the knight of the kingdom has come out searching for her! It is your job to place magical launching platforms to thwart the knight's efforts and send him to his doom (via the open mouth of your pet monster). Featuring 24 original levels and level editor!
